articles.title: FDA grants GSK first-ever approval for RSV vaccine - Pharmaceutical Technology
articles.description: Amidst steep competition, GSK’s Arexvy becomes the first approved RSV vaccine worldwide for preventing RSV in older adults.
articles.content: After a winter marked by a rise in hospitalisations due to the RSV, the FDA has granted its first approval for an Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) vaccine to GSKs Arexvy for adults ages 60 years and… [+2291 chars]

articles.author: Paul Sawers
articles.title: Shopify to reduce workforce by 20%, sells logistics business to Flexport for 13% equity - TechCrunch
articles.description: Shopify is laying off 20% of its workforce, impacting some 2,000 people, and is selling its logistics business to Flexport for 13% in stock.
articles.content:
Shopify revealed today that it’s laying off 20% of its workforce, impacting more than 2,000 people, and is selling its logistics business to Flexport for roughly 13% in stock.

articles.description: The European Union is considering ways to target third countries seen as doing too little to stop Russia evade sanctions, particularly those that can’t explain spikes in trade of key goods or technologies, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: COLOSSAL 180-foot asteroid speeding towards Earth at 81907 kmph today, NASA warns - HT Tech
